SEARCH
Module AM08
Package it.polimi.ingsw.network.server

Class LobbyServer

java.lang.Object
java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
it.polimi.ingsw.network.server.LobbyServer
All Implemented Interfaces:
RMILobbyServerInterface, Serializable, Remote
public class LobbyServer extends UnicastRemoteObject implements RMILobbyServerInterface
This class sets up the main server which will make the player set his name and choose a game to join
See Also:

      Throws:
      RemoteException - if there are problems with the remote connection

  • Method Details

    • start

      public void start()
      This method puts the server online in the RMI registry, it waits for someone to acquire it and stats the tcp server

    • chooseNickname

      public boolean chooseNickname(String nickname) throws RemoteException, ExistentNicknameException, IllegalNicknameException
      Method that the client can call to get a nickname assigned on the server
      Specified by:
      chooseNickname in interface RMILobbyServerInterface
      Parameters:
      nickname - string containing the nickname of the client
      Returns:
      false if the nickname is either banned or already present
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if the connection is lost
      ExistentNicknameException - if the nickname is already present in the list
      IllegalNicknameException - if the nickname is one of the banned words (or contains one)

    • removePlayersAndMatchServerFromLobby

      public void removePlayersAndMatchServerFromLobby(List<String> playersList, MatchServer match)
      This method takes in input the list of nicknames, and it removes all the players from the current pool of players in game
      Parameters:
      playersList - file name where the game was stored
      match - the match server

    • recoverGame

      public String recoverGame(String nickname, RmiClientInterface rmiClient) throws RemoteException, NoGameToRecoverException
      This method calls the recoverGameTcpRmi method It is the method called by a rmi remote call
      Specified by:
      recoverGame in interface RMILobbyServerInterface
      Parameters:
      nickname - nickname of the player that calls the method
      rmiClient - reference to the methods of the client that can be called by the server using RMI
      Returns:
      the information useful for the connection to the game
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if the connection fails
      NoGameToRecoverException - if every game is full or there is no game currently ongoing in the server

    • joinGame

      public String joinGame(String nickname, RmiClientInterface rmiClient, String gameIndex) throws RemoteException, NoGamesAvailableException, AlreadyInGameException, NonExistentNicknameException, NoGameToRecoverException, WrongLobbyIndexException, LobbyFullException
      This method calls the joinGameTcpRmi method It is the method called by a rmi remote call
      Specified by:
      joinGame in interface RMILobbyServerInterface
      Parameters:
      nickname - nickname of the player that calls the method
      rmiClient - reference to the methods of the client that can be called by the server using RMI
      gameIndex - index of the game
      Returns:
      the information useful for the connection to the game
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if the connection fails
      NoGamesAvailableException - if every game is full or there is no game currently ongoing in the server
      AlreadyInGameException - if the player is already in a different game
      NonExistentNicknameException - if the player's nickname is not in the server's list
      NoGameToRecoverException - if there are no games available for recovery
      WrongLobbyIndexException - if the lobby index is not valid
      LobbyFullException - if the lobby is full

    • getLobbies

      public List<Lobby> getLobbies(String nickname) throws NoGamesAvailableException
      This method returns a list of the active lobbies
      Specified by:
      getLobbies in interface RMILobbyServerInterface
      Parameters:
      nickname - the nickname
      Returns:
      the list of active lobbies
      Throws:
      NoGamesAvailableException - if there are no games available

    • createGame

      public String createGame(Integer numPlayers, String nickname, RmiClientInterface rmiClient) throws RemoteException, AlreadyInGameException, NonExistentNicknameException
      This method calls the createGameTcpRmi method It is the method called by a rmi remote call
      Specified by:
      createGame in interface RMILobbyServerInterface
      Parameters:
      numPlayers - number of players that the client has chosen
      nickname - nickname of the player that calls the method
      rmiClient - reference to the methods of the client that can be called by the server using RMI
      Returns:
      the information useful for the connection to the game
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if the connection fails
      AlreadyInGameException - if the player is already in a different game
      NonExistentNicknameException - if the player's nickname is not in the server's list

    • recoverGame

      public String recoverGame(String nickname, TcpClientHandler tcpClient) throws NoGameToRecoverException
      This method calls the joinGameTcpRmi method It is the method called by the tcp client handler
      Parameters:
      nickname - nickname of the player that calls the method

      Throws:
      NoGameToRecoverException - if no games are available to recover

    • joinGame

      public String joinGame(String nickname, TcpClientHandler tcpClient, String lobbyName) throws NoGamesAvailableException, AlreadyInGameException, NonExistentNicknameException, NoGameToRecoverException, WrongLobbyIndexException, LobbyFullException
      This method calls the joinGameTcpRmi method It is the method called by the tcp client handler
      Parameters:
      nickname - nickname of the player that calls the method
      tcpClient - reference to the methods of the client that can be called by the server using RMI
      lobbyName - the name of the lobby
      Returns:
      the information useful for the connection to the game
      Throws:
      NoGamesAvailableException - if no games are available
      AlreadyInGameException - if the player is already in a different game
      NonExistentNicknameException - if the player's nickname is not in the server's list
      NoGameToRecoverException - if no games are available to recover
      WrongLobbyIndexException - if the lobby index is wrong
      LobbyFullException - if the lobby is full

    • createGame

      public String createGame(Integer numPlayers, String nickname, TcpClientHandler tcpClient) throws RemoteException, AlreadyInGameException, NonExistentNicknameException
      This method calls the createGameTcpRmi method It is the method called by the tcp client handler
      Parameters:
      numPlayers - the number of player slots
      nickname - nickname of the player that calls the method
      tcpClient - reference to the methods of the client that can be called by the server using RMI
      Returns:
      the information useful for the connection to the game
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if the connection fails
      AlreadyInGameException - if the player is already in a different game
      NonExistentNicknameException - if the player's nickname is not in the server's list
